summary: On April 9, 1940 Germany invaded Denmark. Based on real events - in Southern Jutland a military unit on bicycles was sent south to help hold back the Germans until reinforcement.
cast: Pilou Asbæk|Lars Mikkelsen|Ari Alexander|Simon Sears|Elliott Crosset Hove|Gustav Dyekjær Giese|Joachim Fjelstrup|Mette Munk Plum|Martin Greis-Rosenthal|Sebastian Bull Sarning|Jesper Hagelskær Paasch|Bálint Bán|Morten Hauch-Fausbøll|Pelle Emil Hebsgaard|Michael Brostrup|Lukas Schwarz Thorsteinsson|Jan Dose|Jannik Lorenzen|Mikkel Bentzen|Maylenah Carmen Angellina Wiliemsborg|Emilia Staugaard|Mathias Lundkvist|Frederik Thorenfeldt Poulsen|Jan Jürgensen|Tue Lodberg Nyland
keywords: danish soldier|nazi invasion|surprise attack|world war two|year 1940
title: 9. april
